"The Lord has opened this matter to me decidedly. The publishing work that has been carried on in Battle Creek 
                                                                           18
should for the present be carried on near Washington. If after a time the Lord says, Move away from Washington, we are to move. We are pilgrims and strangers in this earth, seeking a better country, even a heavenly. When the Lord tells us to move, we are to obey, however inconvenient and inconsistent such a command may seem to us to be."
